original_title: ファルコム jdk バンド 2011 サマーライブ in ニコファーレ
overview: The "Falcom jdk band 2011 Summer Live in Nicofarre" was held on August 12 at Nicofarre in Roppongi, Tokyo. This USB flash drive contains the complete live performance of the first part of the event, and was sold on the day of the event.
title: Falcom jdk Band 2011 Summer Live in Nicofarre
